item.title: Like January 6, Minnesota Is a Test of American National Sovereignty
item.description: ICE tactics are the pretext; the real issue is whether states can make themselves no-go zones immune from federal law.

item.title: Minnesota’s Campaign for Interposition and Nullification
item.description: More than 200 years after the Kentucky Resolutions, a version of nullification still lives.

item.title: The Second Amendment Role Reversal
item.description: The truth is, legally, Alex Pretti was within his rights to have his gun on his person; but that doesn’t mean his actions were prudent.

item.title: Can the University of Austin Be Replicated?
item.description: Its slimmed-down finances could prove as significant as its curriculum.

item.title: Apply Health-Care Tariffs Evenly, or Not at All
item.description: Stronger trade policy begins with consistent treatment of essential medical products.
